title: Gamification-Based Program for Enhancing Information Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience in managing job-related information
context.additional_context: A Program Where Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields Learn Information Classification, Storage, and Retrieval Techniques in Mobile Environments to Improve Work Efficiency. Gamification Elements Motivate Learning and Emphasize Collaborative Task Performance

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify work-related information and assign metadata.
Learners apply strategies to improve information retrieval efficiency on mobile devices by over 30%.
Learners achieve an 80%+ completion rate for collaborative tasks with peers through gamification assignments (e.g., quests, achievement systems).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
